title: OCE ban system is broken
body: Riots report system is absolute garbage, so I was recently perm banned for flaming, bear in mind id only ever flame when people start flaming me for no reason just from having a bad game, I could tell after that game I was going to be banned, the enemy Syndra and a couple of my teammate were all flaming me because I was having a bad game so I then started flaming back I reckon it was justified they deserved it. 2 years of work gone and 150$

replies.body: Seems like Riots ban system is working just fine based on this.

Someone flaming you first doesn't give you a pass to do it, both players are in the wrong. If someone is harassing you, just mute them instead and you won't have this problem.

Permanent bans are also the final step in the [4 tiers of punishment](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/yFLxpAcV-qa-about-player-behavior-systems-chat-log-reviews-and-feedback), meaning either you have been warned and punished before for negative behavior, or your behavior this time was so severe that it warranted escalated multiple punishment tiers.

You admit to harassing other players, so it doesn't sound like there was any error in the system. If you want to discuss the validity of your punishment with the community I recommend posting your Reform Card here for us to view, and also mention what prior punishments you've had (if any). If you want to contest your ban with Riot you have to use a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

My prior warnings have all been from retaliation, i hadnt had any chat bans or anything until a a couple of months ago. Even though Riots ToS explain that toxicity is not tolerated, i put so much effort into that account and money and from a few words, defending myself from people flaming me for having a bit of a bad game, i just don't agree with it and think its unfair.
I realise i was meant to use the mute button but sometimes i just can't sit there and take it and it really gets on my nerves. rip

theres much worse people in the game who just afk and troll yet they don't get banned even after they have been reported by several people

Defending yourself and retaliating are not the same. 

Defending yourself may not help you all that much, and may well add fuel to the fire, but it is perfectly ok and will not see you punished (e.g "I'm not feeding I'm just having a bad game"). 

Retaliating is not ok, you may feel an eye for an eye is just, but if the act of taking an eye is punishable then it follows that you would both be punished for it.  It does not matter who started it, it does not matter who was more toxic, if a behaviour is punishable it is punishable regardless of the reason for it (e.g I'm not feeding you f$%#ing a$%hole you're the bad one here you trash tier piece of shit").

Just because something stands for longer than it should does not make it ok or legitimate, nor is it seen that way, hence the report feature.
